Html:
I am using Excel Data Reader and it is meeting my expectation in terms of Importing excel column data. I need to figure out one more thing. Let's say, I have an Excel column "Title" which is of plain text and then another column "job description" which contains rich texts like: bold font, underlined texts, bulleted texts, illalics texts etc.

Excel Data Reader is ignoring underlined texts, for example, "The cool place". It cannot read after the "The " text. Is there property I have set to enable Excel Data Reader to read underlined texts?
